description: This is a market on whether any of the four NBA Conference Semifinals Series will go to a Game 7. This market will resolve to “Yes” if a Game 7 is scheduled for any of the NBA Conference Semifinal Playoff Series. This market will resolve to “No” if all NBA Conference Semifinal Playoff Series conclude in 6 games or less. The resolution source for this market will be official scheduling information provided by the NBA (https://www.nba.com/news/2021-nba-playoffs-conference-semifinals-schedule). The resolution date for this market will be between June 13, 2021, when the earliest scheduled NBA Conference Semifinal Game 4 will conclude, and June 18, 2021, when the latest scheduled NBA Conference Semifinal Game 6 will conclude. If any of the scheduled First Round Game 6’s are delayed to a date on or before June 25, 2021, resolution will be delayed until those games are played. If any of the Game 6’s are delayed to June 26, 2021 or later, this market will resolve to 50-50. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, this market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

markets.question: Will any NBA Conference Semifinal Series go to a Game 7?

title: Will any NBA Conference Semifinal Series go to a Game 7?
